content.description: Fort Rucker, Alabama 36362Fortenberry-Colton Physical Fitness CenterIndoor Rock Wall 30ft with four auto belaysMust have military ID or military sponsored ID to get on post and in the gym.Lower Alabama is lacking in the climbing scene but something is better than nothing. I recently ordered new holds for the wall and started setting color coded routes. Working on getting shoes and updated autobelays. I'll be at Fort Rucker until 2019 and I am looking to pass the torch to someone local to upkeep the route setting and maintenance. I am strictly a volunteer but I am working on getting the gym to hire someone to train as the climbing facilitator.
